resources.string:
• Debate style formats are now available for download, with only four included in the app. You may need to download the formats you were previously using to continue. 
• Added support for multilingual debate formats, with thanks to Frank Richter. (BP is in English and Spanish; OPD is in German and English.) 
• All formats are now stored in an app-specific Android location. If you have custom formats, you'll be prompted to copy them over. Note: If you uninstall Debatekeeper, custom formats will be deleted, so be sure to have a backup somewhere else. 
• French, German and Spanish interface for devices in those languages 
• New icon, thanks to Alberto Martínez 
• Timer text size now auto-adjusts in Android 8.0 and higher 
• Removed leading zero from minutes 
• Made double and triple bells more evenly timed 
• Added a way to initiate file imports from inside the app 
• Simplified handling of malformed debate style files 
• Fixed notification and service handling 
• Other general updates to bring up to date with Android 10
